(ZHANG Zaikun)

Professor, School of Mathematics, Sun Yat-sen University, Guangzhou, China

Current Position

  • Jan. 2025–present, Professor, School of Mathematics, Sun Yat-sen University, Guangzhou, China

Research interests

  • Mathematical optimization and its applications, especially

    • randomized methods

    • methods for large-scale problems

    • methods for noisy problems

    • derivative-free methods

Education

  • Sept. 2007–July 2012, Ph.D., Institute of Computational Mathematics and Scientific/Engineering Computing (ICMSEC), Chinese Academy of Sciences (CAS), supervised by Professor Ya-xiang Yuan, thesis: On derivative-free optimization methods (in Chinese, but with an English abstract)

  • May 2010–Aug. 2010, visiting student, Institute for Computer Science, University of Bayreuth, Germany, visiting Professor Klaus Schittkowski, funded by Alexander von Humboldt Foundation

  • Sept. 2003–July 2007, B.Sc., Department of Mathematics, Jilin University, China

Contact

  • Address: Room 721, School of Mathematics, Sun Yat-sen University, 135 XinGangXi Road, Haizhu District, Guangzhou 510275, China

  • Email: zhangzaikun [&] mail.sysu.edu.cn, zaikunzhang [&] gmail.com
